message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_FV_NAME_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Provider Group Name' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_FV_NAME_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (Actual length) - maximum allowed is '%1n'.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_FV_COMMENT_IS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (Actual length) - maximum allowed is '%1n'.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_FV_SOME_SEARCH_CRITERIA_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Search criteria must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_FV_REFERENCE_NO_IS_SPECIFIED_OTHER_SEARCH_CRITERIA_IS_SPECIFIED
message.locale: If Reference Number is specified other criteria must not be specified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_XRV_ONLY_CLOSED_STATUS_CAN_BE_REOPENED
message.locale: This provider group is not 'Closed', it cannot be re-opened.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_XRV_USER_CANNOT_CLOSE_CLOSED_PROVIDERGROUP
message.locale: This provider group is already 'Closed'.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_XRV_CANNOT_UPDATE_CLOSED_PROVIDERGROUP
message.locale: This provider group is 'Closed', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_XFV_CONTACT_TYPE_AND_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: The Contact Type and a Contact Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_XFV_CONTACT_TYPE_NOT_SELECTED
message.locale: The Contact Type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_XFV_CONTACT_NAME_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: The Contact Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_XRV_LIVE_CONTRACTS_PRESENT_PROVIDERGROUP_CANNOT_BE_CLOSED
message.locale: There are 'Live' flat rate contracts, this provider group cannot be closed.

message.name: TEXT_PROVIDERGROUP_ENROLLED
message.locale: Enrolled On

message.name: TEXT_PROVIDERGROUP_CONTRACTS_TO_BE_RENEWED
message.locale: Contracts To Be Renewed

message.name: INF_PROVIDERGROUP_NO_CONTRACTS_TO_BE_RENEWED
message.locale: There are no contracts due for renewal.

message.name: INF_PROVIDERGROUP_STATUS
message.locale: Status

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_XRV_PROVIDER_GROUP_PREFFERED_LANGUAGE_DOES_NOT_MATCH_USER_SKILLS_LANGUAGE
message.locale: The Preferred Language, %1c, of the provider group does not match any language in the user skills.

message.name: TEXT_PROVIDERGROUP_EMAIL_ADDRESS
message.locale: Email address

message.name: TEXT_PROVIDERGROUP_PHONE_NUMBER
message.locale: Phone number

message.name: TEXT_PROVIDERGROUP_WEB_ADDRESS
message.locale: Web address

message.name: TEXT_PROVIDERGROUP_EMAIL_TITLE
message.locale: Send an email to this provider group

message.name: TEXT_PROVIDERGROUP_WEB_ADDRESS_TITLE
message.locale: Go to this provider group's website

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERGROUP_FV_NAME_EXCEEDS_MAXLIMIT
message.locale: The value entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.
